mapper.delete: delete from dt_order where id in (${ids});
mapper.select: SELECT doe.*,u.userName,u.realName FROM dt_order_detail dod JOIN dt_user_goods dug ON dug.id = dod.userGoodsId JOIN dt_order doe ON doe.id = dod.orderId JOIN tab_user u ON u.id = doe.userId WHERE dug.userId = #{userId} GROUP BY orderId
